sentence.Network_en: Many people were dependent for their water supply on this pestilential stream.
sentence.Network_cn: 许多人靠这条水质受污、可致疫病的河流来取水。

sentence.Network_en: A few huts were the only habitations to be seen in these pestilential regions.
sentence.Network_cn: 这倒霉地方唯一可看到的住人的地方就是那几间小屋.

sentence.Network_en: We must get rid of these pestilential flies.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们得把这些可恶的苍蝇消灭掉.

entry.def: Pestilential is used to refer to things that cause disease or are caused by disease.

entry.def: Pestilential animals destroy crops or  exist in such large numbers that they cause harm.

sentences.sentence: "a pestilential malignancy in the air"- Jonathan Swift
